name: Chess Eleven
description:
Chess Eleven combines the mechanics of Chess and Football, creating the ultimate tactics game. 

The Game is at a protoype stage, of which the first online version of the game (see image below) will be playable on www.chesseleven.com on the 27th Setpember 2021 at 12.00pm GMT. 

For how to play, please download a copy of the rules by clicking Rules of Chess Eleven

For now, enjoy the first prototype with friends locally.
developers: Dan Smyth - Creator of Chess Eleven
